# Affective polarization → Democratic backsliding

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, out.width="100%"}
library(DiagrammeR)

grViz("
digraph orhan_dag {

  graph [
    layout  = dot,
    rankdir = TB,   // top → bottom
    ranksep = 0.4,  // vertical spacing
    nodesep = 0.4   // horizontal spacing
  ]

  node [shape = rectangle, style = filled, fillcolor = \"#f7f7f7\",
        fontsize = 17, fontname = \"Helvetica\"]

#  AP        [label = \"Affective polarization\"]
  Identity  [label = \"Salient partisan identity & in-/out-group\"]
  Beliefs   [label = \"Biased beliefs about out-party\\n(\\\"existential threat\\\")\"]
  Loyalty   [label = \"Reluctance to cross party lines\\n(partisan loyalty)\"]
  Acc       [label = \"Reduced electoral accountability\"]
  Opp       [label = \"Opportunity for\\nundemocratic incumbents\"]
  Backslide [
    label     = \"Democratic\\nbacksliding\",
    fillcolor = \"#CC0000\",   // red
    fontcolor = \"white\",     // white text
    style     = filled
  ]
  
// Vertical part of the L
#  AP       -> Identity
  Identity -> Beliefs
  Beliefs  -> Loyalty

  // Horizontal part of the L
  Loyalty  -> Acc
  Acc      -> Opp
  Opp      -> Backslide

  // Put these on the same horizontal level to form the base of the L
  { rank = same; Acc; Opp; Backslide }
  
}
")

```
